title: The Death of a Toad - speaker's complex response

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Wilbur uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex response to the death of a toad.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Wilbur uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex response to the death of a toad.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
